Module ToDoList
Package mini.project

Class TaskImpl

java.lang.Object
mini.project.TaskImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Task
public class TaskImpl extends Object implements Task
Author:
meriem harrouz Concrete implementation of the Task interface. Represents an individual task with attributes like name, description, due date, and completion status.

      description - The detailed description of the task
      dueDate - The due date of the task in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
